Verses: 1 aiyo! Aandavar Thamadhu Kobaththil Seeyon Kumaaraththiyai Mandhaaraththinaal Moodinaar; Avar Thamadhu Kobaththin Naalile Thamadhu Paadhapeedaththai Ninaiyaamal Isravelin Magimaiyai Vaanaththilirundhu Tharaiyile Vizhaththallinaar.

2 aandavar Thappavidaamal Yaakkobin Vaasasthalangalaiyellaam Vizhunginaar; Avar Yoodhaa Kumaaraththiyin Arangalaiyellaam Thamadhu Sinaththile Idiththu, Tharaiyode Tharaiyaakkippottaar; Raajyaththaiyum Adhin Prabukkalaiyum Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkinaar.

3 avar Thamadhu Ukkirakobaththile Isravelin Kombu Muzhuvadhaiyum Vettippottaar; Saththuruvukku Munbaaga Avar Thamadhu Valadhukaraththaip Pinnaagath Thiruppi, Sutrilum Iruppadhaip Patchikkira Akkinijuvaalaiyaippol Yaakkobukku Virodhamaaga Eriththaar.

4 pagaignanaippol Thammudaiya Villai Naanetrinaar; Saththuruvaippol Thammudaiya Valadhukaraththai Neettinindru, Kannukku Inbamaanadhaiyellaam Azhiththuppottaar; Seeyon Kumaaraththiyin Koodaaraththile Thammudaiya Ukkiraththai Akkiniyaippol Soriyappanninaar.
5 aandavar Pagaignanpolaanaar; Isravelai Vizhunginaar; Adhin Aranmanaigalaiyellaam Vizhunginaar; Adhin Arangalai Azhiththu, Yoodhaa Kumaaraththikku Migundha Dhukkippaiyum Salippaiyum Undaakkinaar.

6 thottaththin Veliyaippola Irundha Thammudaiya Veliyai Balavandhamaaip Pidungippottaar; Sabaikoodugira Thammudaiya Sthalangalai Azhiththaar; Karththarseeyonile Pandigaiyaiyum Oivunaalaiyum Marakkappanni, Thamadhu Ukkiramaana Kobaththil Raajaavaiyum Aasaariyanaiyum Purakkaniththuvittaar.

7 aandavar Thamadhu Palipeedaththai Ozhiththuvittaar; Thamadhu Parisuththa Sthalaththai Veruththuvittaar; Adhinudaiya Aramanaigalin Madhilgalai Saththuruvin Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Pandigai Naalil Aaravaarampannugiradhupol Karththarin Aalayaththil Aaravaarampanninaargal.

8 karththar Seeyon Kumaaraththiyin Alangaththai Nirmoolamaakka Ninaiththaar; Noolaippottaar; Azhikkaadhapadith Thammudaiya Kaiyai Avar Mudakkikkondadhillai; Aranippaiyum Alangaththaiyum Pulambachcheydhaar; Avaigal Mutrilum Belanatruk Kidakkiradhu.

9 aval Vaasalgal Tharaiyil Amizhndhikkidakkiradhu; Aval Thaazhppaalgalai Muriththu Udaiththuppottaar; Aval Raajaavum Aval Prabukkalum Purajaadhiyaarukkul Irukkiraargal; Vedhamumillai; Aval Theerkkadharisigalukkuk Karththaraal Dharisanam Kidaikkiradhumillai.

10 seeyon Kumaaraththiyin Mooppargal Tharaiyil Utkaarndhu Mownamaai Irukkiraargal; Thangal Thalaigalinmel Puzhudhiyaip Pottukkollugiraargal; Rattu Uduththiyirukkiraargal; Erusalemin Kanniyargal Thalaikavizhndhu Tharaiyai Nokkik Kondirukkiraargal.

11 en Janamaagiya Kumaaraththiyin Norungudhalinimiththam Kanneer Sorigiradhinaal En Kangal Pooththuppogiradhu; En Kudalgal Kodhikkiradhu; En Eeral Ilagith Tharaiyile Vadigiradhu; Kuzhandhaigalum Paalagarum Nagaraththin Veedhigalile Moorchchithdhukkidakkiraargal.

12 avaigal Kuththundavargalaippola Nagaraththin Veedhigalile Moorchchithdhukkidakkumpodhum, Thangal Thaaigalin Madiyile Thangal Praananai Vidum Podhum, Thangal Thaaigalai Nokki: Dhaaniyamum Dhraatcharasamum Enge Engiraargal.

13 erusalem Kumaaraththiye, Naan Unakku Saatchiyaaga Ennaththai Solluven? Unnai Edharku Oppiduven? Seeyon Kumaaraththiyaagiya Kannigaiye, Naan Unnaith Thetrumpadikku Unnai Edharku Nigarsolluven? Un Kaayam Samuththiraththaippol Peridhaayirukkiradhe, Unnaik Gunamaakkugiravan Yaar?

14 un Theerkkadharisigal Abaththamum Viyarththamumaana Dharisanangalai Unakkaagath Tharisiththaargal; Avargal Un Siraiyiruppai Vilakkumpadi Un Akkiramaththai Eduththukkaattaamal, Abaththamaanavaigalaiyum Kedaanavaigalaiyum Unakkaaga Tharisiththaargal.

15 vazhippokkar Yaavarum Unperil Kai Kottugiraargal; Erusalem Kumaaraththiyinperil Eesarpottu, Thangal Thalaigalaith Thulukki: Pooranavadivum Sarvaboomiyin Magizhchchiyumaana Nagaram Idhudhaanaa Engiraargal.

16 un Pagaignar Ellaarum Unperil Thangal Vaayaith Thirakkiraargal; Eesarpottup Parkadikkiraargal; Adhai Vizhunginom, Naam Kaaththirundha Naal Idhuve, Ippozhudhu Namakkuk Kidaiththadhu, Adhaik Kandom Engiraargal.

17 karththar Thaam Ninaiththadhai Seydhaar; Poorvanaatkal Mudharkondu Thaam Kattalaiyitta Thamadhu Vaarththaiyai Niraivetrinaar; Avar Thappavidaamal Nirmoolamaakki, Unmel Pagaignan Sandhoshikkumpadi Seydhaar; Un Saththurukkalin Kombai Uyarththinaar.
18 avargal Irudhayam Aandavarai Nokkik Kooppidugiradhu; Seeyon Kumaaraththiyin Madhile, Iravum Pagalum Nadhiyavvalavu Kanneer Vidu, Oindhiraadhe, Un Kannin Karuppuvizhi Summaayirukka Vottaadhe.

19 ezhundhiru, Raaththiriyile Mudharchaamaththil Kooppidu; Aandavarin Samugaththil Un Irudhayaththaith Thanneeraip Pola Ootrividu; Ellaath Therukkalin Munaiyilum Pasiyinaal Moorchchiththuppogira Un Kuzhandhaigalin Praananukkaaga Un Kaigalai Avaridaththirku Eredu.

20 karththaave, Yaarukku Indhappragaaramaaga Seydheerendru Nokkippaarum; Sthreegal Kaikkuzhandhaigalaagiya Thangal Karppakkaniyaith Thinnavendumo? Aandavarudaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththil Aasaariyanum Theerkkadharisiyum Kolaiseyyappadavendumo?

21 ilaignanum Mudhirvayadhullavanum Therukkalil Tharaiyile Kidakkiraargal; En Kannigaigalum En Vaalibarum Pattayaththaal Vizhundhaargal; Umadhu Kobaththin Naalile Vetti, Avargalaith Thappavidaamal Kondrupotteer.

22 pandigainaalil Kumbugalai Varavazhaippadhupol Sutrilumirundhu Enakkuth Thigilgalai Varavazhaiththeer; Karththarudaiya Kobaththin Naalile Thappinavanum Meedhiyaanavanumillai; Naan Kaigalil Endhi Valarththavargalai En Pagaignan Naasampanninaan.
